name: Obi-Wan Kenobi, Jedi Knight
Lore: 'Padawan learner promoted to Jedi Knight after his encounter with Darth Maul. Has sworn to train Anakin Skywalker, even if the Jedi Council forbids it.',
Text: 'Deploys -2 to Naboo. Power +2 if Maul present. If Qui-Gon is participating in lightsaber combat and Obi-Wan is present, Qui-Gon may use Obi-Wan''s combat cards. Immune to Sniper and attrition < 5.',
